original_text: And he passed through mount Ephraim, and passed through the land of Shalisha, but they found them not: then they passed through the land of Shalim, and there they were not: and he passed through the land of the Benjamites, but they found them not.
korean_text: 그가 에브라임 산지와 살리사 땅으로 두루 다녀 보았으나 찾지 못하고 사알림 땅으로 두루 다녀 보았으나 그 곳에는 없었고 베냐민 사람의 땅으로 두루 다녀 보았으나 찾지 못하니라

sentences.original_text: And he passed through mount Ephraim
and passed through the land of Shalisha
then they passed through the land of Shalim
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그들이 살림 땅을 지나갔으나

sentences.original_text: and he passed through the land of the Benjamites
